TopicTitle: Quote windows broken in existing posts

Articles.Content:
Is anyone else having trouble viewing quote boxes in existing threads? The quotes themselves are still there, but I can no longer see who was being quoted; the field with the quoted user's name is blank. Instead, there's a little arrow and the quote box can be opened and closed like a spoiler box.

I tried it on Chrome and Edge and got the same error. It's also affecting my private messages.

Is anyone else having trouble viewing quote boxes in existing threads? The quotes themselves are still there, but I can no longer see who was being quoted; the field with the quoted user's name is blank. Instead, there's a little arrow and the quote box can be opened and closed like a spoiler box.

I tried it on Chrome and Edge and got the same error. It's also affecting my private messages.

This is a test.

It looks like "highlight" quoting is no longer working for me either. Usually I can highlight text with the mouse cursor, and after a second or so a dialog bubble pops up with a "quote this" button. The dialog bubble still pops up, but it is much smaller and there is nothing inside it to click on.
Hi guys, this have been reported to IPS, it seems like a new bug...  Lets wait for their answer.

Looks like it has been fixed?

I thought it was just me, apparently im not alone.

Edited October 5, 2017 by NSEP
Yes @NSEP IPS has corrected the problem.
Thanks @ManeTI, you are awesome.
